summary: As of FY 2024, DOD was the only major federal agency that had never achieved a clean audit opinion—when auditors find that financial statements are presented fairly and consistent with accounting principles. This Q&A describes DOD's audit approaches and its planned timelines for addressing key problems that audits found. DOD must achieve a clean audit opinion by 2028 and has efforts under way. These include...
title: DOD Financial Management: Status of Remediation Efforts to Meet Audit Mandate
